QuestData.Title: Might of the Sentinels
QuestData.Description: The Twilight's Hammer? Here?$B$BThis is far more serious than I expected. We've got to put a stop to this. I don't know if I'm ready to lead such an offensive, but I'm not about to let my fears get in the way of what needs to be done!$B$BI will rally our forces from Feathermoon Stronghold. Head to Dire Maul, make your way to the arena, and disrupt Cho'gall's activities; we will launch our attack during the confusion.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome back from the battle! The Twilight's Hammer have been disgraced in the eyes of the Gordunni, and driven from Feralas.$B$BWe've shown the glory of the Alliance in full force today! Be proud!
